cover: NOSSAS STIMULATES DEMOCRATIC AND SOLIDARITY ACTIVISM IN BRAZIL

header.title: Join us
header.description: NOSSAS helps individuals, collectives and organizations in their struggle for rights and better public policies. We share opportunities for action, methodologies and tools for creating impactful mobilizations. Explore our platform for activists and push your movement with us!

trainings.about: Throughout the year, NOSSAS carries out free activism training programs on different themes for people all over Brazil.  See how the program works.

incubations.about: Receive training, support and mentoring through NOSSAS’s incubation program. We accelerate mobilization and solidarity projects that want to impact the world.

technologies.about: Discover BONDE, NOSSAS's technology platform, specially developed for amateur or experienced activists to create their custom-made campaigns.

1.title: Release the Tablet
1.description: Sao Paulo's government purchased electronic tablets for public school students in 2020, but so far it has not provided the equipment to assist young people in their remote education.

2.title: Metrô, Aumento Não!
2.description: The Rio de Janeiro subway ticket can increase to R $ 6.30. Meu Rio is fighting this cowardice with the pocket of the worker, who already pays dearly for a bad service.

3.title: Emergency aid until the end of the pandemic
3.description: The end of the emergency aid payments in 2021 could leave thousands of people in poverty. Our campaign is fighting so that aid continues to be paid while the crisis lasts.

4.title: There are people going hungry
4.description: A national mobilization is raising funds to fight hunger and poverty during the pandemic. Food is needed, hunger cannot wait!

sustainability.description: NOSSAS is funded by donations from individuals and foundations which believe in our work and the impact we wish to have on the world. The organization does not accept money from political parties, public utilities or private companies, and our accounts are audited every year by independent professionals. Here's how to donate!
